title: papasugarman
author: papasugarman
created_time: May 12, 2023, 09:55:58 AMLast edit: May 12, 2023, 06:57:04 PM by papasugarman
content: Hello all,We are launching a new memecoin on ETH. I am looking for social media manager and someone who can run the marketing campaign for the proposed memecoin. We will start with Telegram and twitter. I had previously acquired services of someone from this forum for social media handling and it turned out great. I'm looking for a re-run of that. Looking for media managers for a new memcoin. If you are interested and have a portfolio of a previous coin you have marketed, please get in touch. Regards.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Why not re-hire that guy that you've hired before for his social media service? I also saw that you've posted another thread on the Altcoin Discussion with the same post.You might just lock that thread and have this one on the marketplace remain open since this is the right section if you'll be paying in your meme coin and on Services for bitcoin payment.

comments.author: ReiMomo
comments.body: Memecoins a new type of cryptocurrency inspired by popular memes. The best meme coins of 2023 have developed in to stand alone cryptocurrencies, some of hitch are hidden gems. The most popular meme coins are Shiba INU (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE). The top seven Memecoins to buy in 2023 is Pepe, Wojak, AlDoge, Folki, Tamadoge, Shiba Inu, Dogecoin. Memecoins are highly volatile and financial risky, the price of Memecoin is moves within a short period of time. So if you want to invest in Memecoin first invest with a small amount. You could either get profit or loss, so that you can manage your financial situation.

comments.body: Memecoin I have invested in many projects, if you are interested in advertising, you can contact me

comments.author: Rupok
comments.body: People are still interested in meme coin. They claim that it will give 100x more profit by 2026 than the current price. Among meme coins, floki inu, pepe, xen doge these coins will give 100x more profit in future.But how is this possible because we can see foki and pepe already dead in the current market.  I think it's just to encourage investors.I have seen many altcoins that got a lot of hype a few years ago but now they don't exist anymore.  And people have lost a lot of money on altcoin.So if you want to make a risky investment, you must analyze yourself well.

comments.body: Hi    I am looking to promote this project on a new micro blogging platform- It has a vibrant community and great engagements.The platform already has more than 5000 users and the engagements has peaked 20000 interactions in a short period of 24-38 hoursWhat we offer to youWe can help you ger- Free exposure to your project - Engagement in terms of discussion of the project and sharing information and create digital awareness- We offer a lot many more things depending on your needs In short we offer you a great marketing opportunity at no costPlease do share your email for setting up of an online meeting at a suitable time and your discord server & any  socal media handle to connect and take things forward
